Text:
Great quality.  Done with a scanner, unlike the previous posts.  Some of the pages vary in dimension, but they're all clear and upright.

Thank you to the people who made this happen!  This is an awesome book.  I hope one day to be able to afford a real copy.
anyone able to get this working on iPad?  Cant seem to get them to load after putting them in ibooks.

This is a Great, Legit, Clear copy!  I never post on TPB, but I have been looking for this for a while.

No comment on the iPad.  Works great in Preview on OSX.   Just wanted to add that the torrent has been OCR'd. (i.e. searchable text)  Thanks again for the compute power and time guys!

Yes Anonymous,that what i am talking about!!
thanks very much,this copy are really readable and the quality of the pictures great,i hope i can afford this book next year!
another great work of you,thanks to you and buffguy!!
the cooker  love and say we all  love raw cook meat..

Gawd, I'd so like to have a real perfect and legal ebook copy, but as a studend 600 bucks are just like 10 times too much ^_^

Quality is great in this one, thanks!

There are several YouTube videos worth watching by Nathan Myhrvold about this work.

Wish I had the $600 but I don't so I'm so grateful to the uploader. Sharing with my son, the scientist.

Thnxs a lot!!
